text: the explosions ripped through this
densely populated neighborhood in
Kaohsiung city as you can see the
strength of the blast was so powerful
that it tore up this entire Street for
about one kilometer and several other
streets have been affected as well it
was so powerful that some of the signs
on the businesses have been blown off
and many cars were flipped upside down
now the authorities believe that one may
have caused the blast is that many
petrochemical companies have pipelines
running underground under the street in
many other streets in baoshan baoshan
after always once the center of the
petrochemical industry in Taiwan they
believe some chemical leak from the
pipelines may have caused the blast now
many of the residents say that they were
shocked by the blast
they were home at the time and they felt
they were literally blown off their seat
some of them saw was an earthquake
others thought it was a bomb but they
were actually the lucky ones because
most of the data for people who came
outside because they smelled a strong
odor but people who were passing by
under scooters and they were the ones
who were most injured or killed by the
blast so the death toll could very well
rise because the locals already say that
some 300 people have been sent to almost
every hospital in the city and they
suffered from varying degrees of
injuries including severe burns
